title: Still ‘no indication’ that dog thieves in South Africa mark properties with coloured stickers
subtitle: An
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
South Africans that criminals are using coloured stickers to mark properties from which dogs can be stolen is doing the rounds on social media.

It says dog-snatchers use a red sticker to mark properties with big dogs, yellow for medium dogs and pink for small dogs.

The image even uses the logo of the SPCA - the Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.
